title: Media-Based Language Learning Design in Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate-level language proficiency in a specialized field
context.additional_context: Need for modular content design to support workplace-integrated learning for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can complete 15-minute self-directed learning sessions five times per week in a mobile environment.
Learners can utilize 30 job-specific terms in context-based dialogues relevant to workplace situations.
Learners can achieve 80% or higher weekly learning achievement rates through peer assessment and quiz features.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
